content:
BasicDesignerLoader+ReloadOptions Enum

In this Article

Defines the behavior of the stem.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload* method. These flags can be combined using the bitwise OR operator.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Flags]
protected enum BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • BasicDesignerLoader+ReloadOptions

Fields

Default

The designer loader flushes changes before reloading, but it does not force a reload, and it also does not set the stem.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified* property to true if load errors occur.
Force

The designer loader forces the reload to occur. Normally, a reload occurs only if the stem.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.IsReloadNeeded* method returns true. This flag bypasses calling this method and always performs the reload.
ModifyOnError

The designer loader will set the stem.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified* property to true if load errors occur. This flag is useful if you want a flush of the loader to overwrite persistent state that had errors.
NoFlush

The designer loader abandons any changes before reloading.
